analysis.description:
WrapEtheremon.ETH_TOKEN_ADDRESS (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol#567-571) shadows:
	- Utils.ETH_TOKEN_ADDRESS (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol#317-319)

WrapEtheremon.catchMonster (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol#681-734) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(this) == startTokenBalance)
class in EtheremonWorldNFT.getMonsterClassBasic (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol#268) is a local variable never initialiazed
class in EtheremonWorldNFT.getPrice (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol#275-277) is a local variable never initialiazed
class in EtheremonWorldNFT.catchMonsterNFT (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol#192-193) is a local variable never initialiazed
obj in EtheremonWorldNFT.burnMonster (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol#183) is a local variable never initialiazed
class in EtheremonWorldNFT.catchMonster (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol#234) is a local variable never initialiazed

EtheremonWorldNFT.mintMonster (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol#162-180) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-data.addElementToArrayType(EtheremonEnum.ArrayType.STAT_BASE,objId,value) (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol#174-178)

EtheremonWorldNFT.catchMonsterNFT (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol#190-223) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-data.addElementToArrayType(EtheremonEnum.ArrayType.STAT_BASE,objId,value) (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol#215-217)

EtheremonWorldNFT.catchMonster (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol#227-264) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-data.addElementToArrayType(EtheremonEnum.ArrayType.STAT_BASE,objId,value) (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol#261-262)

WrapEtheremon.calcPlayerChange (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,change) (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol)

EtheremonWorldNFT.mintMonster has external calls inside a loop:
	- value = uint8(seed % STAT_MAX) + data.getElementInArrayType(EtheremonEnum.ArrayType.STAT_START,uint64(_classId),i) (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol#171-174)

EtheremonWorldNFT.mintMonster has external calls inside a loop:
	- data.addElementToArrayType(EtheremonEnum.ArrayType.STAT_BASE,objId,value) (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol#174-178)

EtheremonWorldNFT.catchMonsterNFT has external calls inside a loop:
	- value = uint8(seed % STAT_MAX) + data.getElementInArrayType(EtheremonEnum.ArrayType.STAT_START,uint64(_classId),i) (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol#212-215)

EtheremonWorldNFT.catchMonsterNFT has external calls inside a loop:
	- data.addElementToArrayType(EtheremonEnum.ArrayType.STAT_BASE,objId,value) (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol#215-217)

EtheremonWorldNFT.catchMonster has external calls inside a loop:
	- value = uint8(seed % STAT_MAX) + data.getElementInArrayType(EtheremonEnum.ArrayType.STAT_START,uint64(_classId),i) (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol#257-261)

EtheremonWorldNFT.catchMonster has external calls inside a loop:
	- data.addElementToArrayType(EtheremonEnum.ArrayType.STAT_BASE,objId,value) (/unique_chucks/12/0xffa4bee0b9cd2c2e4eacb8d8f11096baa3e6c55d.sol#261-262)
